page.title: 19A DAY IN EDUCATION
page.content: {Monday }School starts at 8.50.a.m. We go into the classroom and have maths until 10.o.a.m. when we go into the hall to have apparatus. We have to change into shorts, T shirts and plimsolls first. .after apparatus we have playtiome. We have a T.V. Programme - Zig-Zag. That last 20 minutes and we go back to the classroom to discuss it and do some writing. Lunchtime is next. This is from 12.00. until 1.15 p.m. After lunch until 2.30.p.m. we are doing our projects. At the moment we are doing plants. We have planted seeds and made a diary of how they grow. We have planted some outside in the garden. We keep watering them and recording what they are doing. Another playtime and after that we carry on with our projects, then we listen to a story and at 3.30.p.m. we go home.
